resources.string:
This application helps to avoid accidents due to drowsyness or sleepiness. We are implementing this concept on hardware to provide better solutions as mobile phone's cameras are not precise.
 
 How to use It.
 -put mobile phone on the windshield with help of phone Holder.
 -put mobile phone in landscape mode.
 -adjust it towards your face and make sure it detects your face.
 -everything is ready now.
 -swipe right to start.
 - whenever it detects that eyes are closed or no eyes are detected then it fires alarm.
